category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_store_occ_uid_path_in_teamcenter
preference.preference_description: Use CATIA_store_occ_uid_path_in_teamcenter(=false) to improve performance on save with assemblies containing a lot of publications. However, this implies that data used to identify instances for the Read Linked Documents process are not saved: it could lead to misleading instances activation.
